description:
Viper`s older brother has come to Earth to get revenge on the Keroro platoon for killing his brother.  Unlike his little brother, he doesn`t have a weakness for tokusatsu shows or a tendency to follow all of their cliches!  Or does he?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dororo contre-attaque / La monstrueuse grenouille des mers du sud
ドロロ 逆襲するは我にあり であります / 巨大カエル対南海の大怪獣 であります
